reviewText: Excellent instruction on the finer points of Platform Tennis. Especially good for those who are taking up the sport with a Tennis base .Many important but subtle differences from Tennis ,with emphasis on how to and why ,are carefully explained. Screen play is broken down to fundamentals that make it both understandable and doable. Strategy of the game clarified with tournamrnt play used as an instruction base--both real time and slow motion. Excellent.
